name: Learn to read and write Japanese kanji
description: Free API to the Kanji alive web application with CC-BY licensed language data on Japanese kanji, radicals and associated media files.

api_methods.name: Kanji grade level
api_methods.description: The Advanced Search URL parameters are described here as individual endpoints to permit per parameter testing. Parameters may be combined as required.

utterances.utterance: Can you show me all the kanji characters taught in the third grade?
I need a list of kanji that students learn in the fifth grade.
What are the kanji included in the first-grade curriculum?
Please display the kanji that are part of the sixth-grade syllabus.
Could you fetch the kanji taught in the second grade for me?
I’m looking for the kanji that fourth graders study.
Show me the kanji that are introduced in the seventh grade.
What kanji do students learn in the eighth grade?
Can you provide the kanji that are part of the ninth-grade curriculum?
I’d like to see the kanji taught in the tenth grade.
